page.title: 06HOME LIFE 1
page.content: Adults get up between 6_7.30a.m. but if involved in shift work this would vary.Some eat a light breakfast but some have fried egg, bacon & sausage. Wives at home spend much time feeding and playing with their children or taking and collecting them from school & cleaning the house.Adults at work mostly have evenings and weekends free Leisure activities include watching television, handicrafts, decorating, reading & caring for pets but outside pastimes are also enjoyed.Some families are more mobile & move house regularly due to job opportunities. Elderly people have more time at home when retired.Most families eat their main meal of the day in the evening, when everyone is at home.
